name: Mixed Bag 9 Quiz | Mixed 10 Q. Difficult [D] | 10 Questions

questions.text: On which planet is a day twice as long as its year?
questions.explanation:
Mercury.

	It is the planet closest to the sun.

questions.text: Disney World , in Florida, opened how many years after Disneyland?
questions.explanation:
16.

	Disneyland opened in 1955 and Disney World opened in 1971.

questions.text: Name the clown played by James Stewart in 'The Greatest Show On Earth'.
questions.explanation:
Buttons.

	He was a doctor disguised as a clown hiding from the police.

questions.text: What color flag indicates there is one more lap to go in an automobile race?
questions.explanation:
White.

	A yellow flag means caution, a red flag stops the race and a black flag is used to flag a car off the track.

questions.text: At what age is a camel fully matured?
How old was Lincoln when his mother died?
questions.explanation:
9.

	She died of milk sick that was caused by drinking poisoned milk from cows that had eaten wild snakeroot plants.

questions.text: Who played detective Joe Leland in the movie 'The Detective'?
questions.explanation:
Frank Sinatra.

	It was made in 1968 and co-starred Lee Remick.

questions.text: What type of cooking untensil is a ramekin?
questions.explanation:
Baking dish.

	It is a dish used for both baking and serving. It is also defined as a seasoned dish of bread crumbs baked with eggs and cheese.

questions.text: What popular singer had the nickname 'The Polish Prince'?
What city was the home of comic strip character Mary Worth?
